product_name: The North Face Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Top - Women's
long_description: Perfect for training when it gets chilly, the women's Impulse Active Quarter-Zip top from The North Face uses moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) polyester fabric for fast drying and great breathability. Made of crushed coconut husks and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive will not wash out. The North Face Impulse quarter-zip shirt features a zippered chest pocket to stash workout accessories. Raglan sleeves offer a comfortable, nonbinding fit; thumbholes keep sleeves over hands and wrists for greater warmth. Hem is slightly longer in back than front, increasing coverage for active sports. Flatlock seams reduce chafing and increase durability. The North Face women's Impulse Active Quarter-Zip top feature reflective highlights to increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Perfect for training when it gets chilly, the women's Impulse Active Quarter-Zip top from The North Face uses moisture-wicking FlashDry(TM) polyester fabric for fast drying and great breathability.
